name: Free Booking Plugin for Hotels, Restaurant and Car Rental – eaSYNC
author: Syntactics, Inc.

sections.description:
This plugin requires a Paypal Merchant Account in order to get the Client ID

Simplify a Customer’s Booking Experience with the eaSYNC Booking Plugin – a WordPress Reservation Plugin for Car Rentals, Hotels, and Restaurants!

Homepage | Pricing for Hotel Booking | Pricing for Car Booking | Demo

The plugin can be very useful in scenarios such as booking of car rental services for those who need a car for special occasions and activities. It can also be used for booking of hotel accommodation for guests and activity organizers. Function halls and party rooms can be included for those who wish to set up events like birthdays, baby showers, and Christmas parties. Lastly, it can also handle restaurant and food reservations for special occasions like Valentines day, date nights, family get-togethers, and business dinners.

You can view below the great and useful features of this plugin, starting with the common features for all modules and then we’ll break it down to specific capabilities:

Common Features

*Easy install and use (Installation Service Available)
*Fully responsive booking forms
*Sleek UI
*Booking entries are categorized into Active, Inactive, Pending and Trash
*Guests will receive emails when their reservation is confirmed
*Automatic sorting to pending entries
*Easy integration into posts/pages
*Paypal ready
*Option to turn on/off specific module
*Can set currency code for products or services
*Can customize email header and footer text
*Auto currency and price change based on Geolocation; use of 3rd party service comes from https://free.currencyconverterapi.com/
*Free Currency Converter – Terms of Service: https://free.currencyconverterapi.com/terms-of-service

Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy of this software and associated documentation files (the “Software”), to deal in the Software without restriction, including without limitation the rights to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell copies of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is furnished to do so, subject to the following conditions:

Car Rental

The simple, minimalist but bright design that provides the client with a self-explanatory and easy-to-follow car rental process. This car booking plugin feature is simple for those who are starting out in WordPress.

Front-end:
* Calendar Representation of pick-up and return date
* Can view available cars
* Can view car features

Back-end:
* Calendar Representation of entries
* Can add and set menu categories
* Can set thank you page, privacy policy and terms and conditions
* Can monitor rented cars via visual representation
* Can display due date if rented car has not been returned yet
* Can notify both admin and customer by email
* Can set car model, car type and pick up location

  • Car Rental Demo

Hotel Reservation

This WP hotel booking feature has its automated check-out date counter displays a preview of the plugin’s automation capabilities – serving as a sneak peek of its overall convenience.

Front-end:
* Calendar Representation of pick-up and return date
* Can view available rooms for accommodation
* Can view room’s gallery

Back-end:
* Calendar representation of entries
* Can add room type
* Can add Special Request option
* Can set thank you page, privacy policy and terms and conditions
* Can notify both admin and customer by email

  • Hotel Demo

Restaurant Reservation

A stunning and interactive visual representation of the date and time slots draws the clients in – inviting them to reserve a table. This WordPress booking plugin acknowledges that time is a valuable resource, the client information form is kept simple – asking only what is necessary to speed up the process.

Front-end:
* Calendar Representation of picked schedule
* User can select desired restaurant branch

Back-end:
* Calendar Representation of entries
* Can add menu and set menu categories
* Can set thank you page, privacy policy and terms and conditions
* Can set 5 time slots schedule
* Can notify both admin and customer by email
* Can set branch

  • Restaurant Demo

The Best Part — It’s Absolutely a Free Version

We grant permission, free of charge, to any person who obtains a copy of this WordPress booking plugin and associated documentation files (the “Software”), to deal in the Software without restriction, including without limitation the rights to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell copies of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is furnished to do so.

Translations

  • English – default, always included

3rd Party Service

*We used https://free.currencyconverterapi.com/ for auto conversation of price based on user location.
*No personal user information is involved in this service, just the price conversation only
*3rd Party terms of service https://free.currencyconverterapi.com/terms-of-service
*We used https://www.geoplugin.com/ to geolocate visitors, allowing you to provide geolocalised content more relevant to their geographical location.
*No personal user information is involved in this service, just the location only
*3rd Party privacy policy https://www.geoplugin.com/privacy
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

Automatic Installation

  1. Login to WordPress admin panel
  2. Click on Plugins > Add New
  3. Find the plugin by typing ‘eaSYNC Booking’ on the search bar
  4. Click the ‘Install Now’ button
  5. After the successful installation, click on the Activate button to start using the plugin

Uploading the WordPress Plugin

  1. Login to WordPress admin panel
  2. Click on Plugins > Add New
  3. Click on the ‘Upload Plugin’ button
  4. Once redirected to the plugin upload page, click the Choose File button and select the eaSYNC Booking plugin file
  5. Click on the ‘Install Now’ button
  6. After the successful installation, click on the Activate Plugin link to start using the plugin

How to use this plugin

Adding Shortcode

  1. Create a full width page (optional)
  2. Copy and paste the shortcodes below

For Hotel Room

Shortcode: [easync_hotel_code]
To add hotel room type, go to auto generated eaSYNC Hotel in your sidebar

For Car Rental

Shortcode: [easync_car_code]
To add car rental, go to auto generated eaSYNC Car Rental in your sidebar

For Restaurant Reservation

Shortcode: [easync_restau_code]
To add menu type, go to auto generated eaSYNC Restao in your sidebar
sections.faq:
How can I embed booking modules on a page or post?

To embed modules like Car Rental, go to Page or Post in the admin panel and use this shortcode: “[easync_car_code]” without double quote.
For other modules:
[easync_hotel_code] = Hotel Booking
[easync_restau_code] = Restaurant Reservation

Will this booking system work for me?

We’re pretty sure about that! We made this plugin as flexible as possible. This plugin books car rentals, hotel rooms, and restaurant reservations. If you have multiple businesses this is very suitable for you.

What payment methods the plugin support

Our plugin supports Paypal payment.

How will I know the car has been returned

Our plugin supports monitoring feature for expected car returns.

Why is my plugin not working?

Your WordPress version maybe one of the reasons why our plugin isn’t working on your site. Our plugin runs on WordPress versions 3.0 or higher. Upgrading your WordPress version might fix the problem
There also might be plugin conflicts with our plugin and your existing plugins. If errors still occur, you can post a ticket on our support (https://wordpress.org/support/plugin/easync-booking) so we can address your concern accordingly.

Can you provide plugin installation services on my website?

Yes! You can email us at (inquiries@syntacticsinc.com) for a quotation on our installation services

Will you add additional features to the plugin?

Yes, we will be releasing eaSYNC version 2 as well as a premium version for it, so stay tuned!

Do you offer support?

Yes! You can post a ticket on our support (https://wordpress.org/support/plugin/easync-booking) so we can address your concern accordingly.

Are the forms GDPR compliant?

We comply with the Data Privacy Act and ensure that we keep our customer’s personal information in confidence. You can check our Privacy Policy here.

sections.reviews:
Indian Currency Not Available in list

By umakant4u on December 10, 2022

Plugin very Good Working. Some Missing like Indian Currency.

Awesome Support and Assistance from Developers!

By drbenliu on August 18, 2021

I ran into some trouble installing the plugin on my website and it caused some errors. But I immediately contacted their support team and they were super quick to respond and help me out. Now, the plugin is working really on my website and is helping me with my bookings. Thank you!

Dosen`t work

By fah121 on August 11, 2021

Featured explained like "adding menu" is not available anywhere! time slut adding tools is bad! you have to play with some funny time set widget to get it done!

Amazing tool for hotels!

By anacruzau on June 30, 2021

I currently develop and maintain a website for a hotel. It definitely helps in organizing and booking customer's schedules especially that a lot of travelers are moving in and out again. I would definitely recommend this plugin for hotels and similar businesses!

Great plugin for restaurants!

By nathandime123 on May 21, 2021

We were afraid of our operations being disrupted by COVID. But thanks to Easync, we were able to push through since we could have customers reserve ahead on our website. With Easync, we could also monitor and follow the allowed number of customers to avoid overcrowding. Thanks, Easync!

Too much spam

By sukhanov on May 14, 2021

Too much spam

Helpful for Car Rental Business After Post-COVID Reopenings

By quirkybubba123 on March 29, 2021

Ever since places started opening again, more people have been booking our vehicles for their trips. This plugin is very helpful because it helps us organize our available cars and plot the schedules for rentals properly.

Very Effective Car Rental Management Plugin

By cooperssmashrepairs on January 25, 2021

I'm a developer and I thought about trying the plugin for a car rental website project last year and my client was very satisfied. He liked how the process is simplified. Very helpful plugin. Looking forward to new updates.

Easy Install / Great Support

By tavit on November 7, 2020

The EaSync booking plugin is very easy to setup and configure, has plenty of flexibility to meet various business needs. They also have an excellent technical support team.

Easy tracking and booking system for restaurants

By golocalbusinesslisting1 on September 25, 2020

Ever since the pandemic, limiting your customers has been a struggle. But thanks to the Easync plugin, it's easy to keep track of customers to prioritize! They can book and order ahead via the website and the plugin. So, we can inform other customers our restaurant ability and avoid overcrowding or mis-booking!
